text: Steven Yeun (born December 21, 1983) is a South Korean-American actor, voice actor and singer. He is most well known for his role as "Glenn" in the AMC original series The Walking Dead. Yeun was born in Seoul, South Korea and grew up in Troy, Michigan. Along with The Walking Dead, he has acted in multiple movies and television series, such as The Big Bang Theory and The Lemons Show. In 2021, he was nominated for an Academy Award and Golden Globe Award. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:People from Troy, Michigan Category:Actors from Seoul
title: Steven Yeun
